pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pbn2htmlconvert pbn file to html# Usage````pip install pbn2htmlpbn2html "local.pbn"````## example````````## snapshot* # Development````# docker run -it -v $PWD:/app -w /app python:3.8 bash# python3 -m pip install --user --upgrade twine wheel# python3 setup.py sdist clean# rm -rf dist# python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel# cat > ~/.pypirc# python3 -m twine upload --skip-existing --verbose dist/*````# Reference* http://www.tistis.nl/pbn/* http://bridgecomposer.com/
